data.description: Technique and practice of several basic African dance forms with study of their musical, historical and cultural contexts.
data.title: AFRICAN DANCE

data.description: Technique, practice and performance of complex African and African-based dances in relation to polyrhythmic musical and percussive accompaniment. Study of historical and cultural contexts of these forms. Development of improvisational skills in dialogue with musicians.
data.title: AFRICAN DANCE PERFORMANCE
